snippet.title: This Child Of Mine | Demo Trailer #2
snippet.description:
This game is a short 2.5D adventure platformer developed over the course of 3 months by a 3 person team. Travel along with a woman and her child surviving during an alien invasion. Inspired by classic sci-fi, this quiet, melancholy journey will show the depths a mother will go to protect her child, if she can survive...

It has recently gone live on Steam and it's completely free. It's also on Kickstarter, if successfully funded, a full version will be made. 

Steam 

http://goo.gl/DY6f6S  

Kickstarter

http://goo.gl/sStXNS
